questions.question: What is the name of the product or system being tested?
questions.description: Used to identify which system this test script applies to

questions.question: What module or feature does this test script cover?
questions.description: Specifies the specific area of functionality being tested

questions.question: What version of the product is being tested?
questions.description: Tracks which version this test script validates

questions.question: Who is the QA Engineer preparing this test script?
questions.description: Identifies the person responsible for creating the test script

questions.question: What is the preparation date for this test script?
questions.description: Records when the test script was created

questions.question: What is the unique Script ID for this test script?
questions.description: Unique identifier for tracking and referencing this test script

questions.question: What does this test script verify?
questions.placeholder: e.g., Validates that users can successfully log in with valid credentials
questions.description: Brief summary of the test objective

questions.question: What pre-conditions must be met before executing this test?
questions.placeholder: List each pre-condition on a new line
questions.description: Conditions that must be true before the test can be executed

questions.question: What are the step-by-step test instructions?
questions.description: Ordered instructions for performing the test

questions.question: What is the expected result after executing this test script?
questions.placeholder: e.g., User is successfully authenticated and redirected to dashboard
questions.description: Defines what should happen if the test passes

questions.question: Link this test script to requirements and test cases
questions.description: Maps test scripts back to requirements for traceability

questions.question: Who needs to approve this test script?
questions.description: Records who approved the test script and when
